Parts.Text:
Look you need to get up.

 I dont want to say this but your life is a mess..

Don't look at me like that

 Do you even recognise me??

 Pan?! Your best friend?!?!
I know stuff is hard right now but if you just hear me out I can help you

I've got this new idea, and I want you to run it.
 Obviously I'll give you some money to start it, and I'll try to help you out where I can

 But realistically, it's all up to you.

Companies are starting to store data in big servers, but they have no idea what they're doing.

 That's where you come in.

What if we could hold their data for them? Hosting their data over the internet.

 I know it sounds crazy, but with your expertise and my money, I think we could make it work..
